Author: numberonesleepygirl
Text: I’m Italian, I used to be of the mindset that if whatever I was cooking didn’t start or finish with some olive oil it wasn’t real food. When I get better everything has olive oil in it, when I get like this I want to be sick thinking about the grease

Author: n0kikin0ki
Text: to be fair, i don't like oil or fatty foods period. like if i see a recipe requires oil, i just omit it.
